title: Loras.edu
description: Loras.edu shares news and information about Loras with the world.

title: Duhawks.com
description: Duhawks.com is your source for all things Loras athletics.

title: DuConnect
description: DuConnect connects students and employees with clubs, activities and events at Loras. It requires an employee or student login.

title: InsideLoras
description: InsideLoras is Loras' SharePoint site. It's a wealth of information. It requires an employee or student login.
